name: Retro Spacer: Special Edition
description:
RetroSpacer is my first ever game I developed and released, aswell as fully finished.

I learned it in an engine I didn't use before too, took me 33 hours to learn it, make the first version, and now the full version with extra fluff.

Original:
Play as Icarus as you try to ascend to the top. He has access to a machete, pistol and bombs! Icarus is a human, getting hit would kill him. However he wears armor which slows him down and takes a hit for him.

Special edition:

A local multiplayer system, to play with friends online you'll need some third party software. But if you have extra gamepads around and some buds you can play together.

Hard mode. The original was a bit easy so I decided to make a hard mode, it makes you restart the whole thing if you die.

I hope you have fun! Also yes, I am scared a bit since it's my first upload.
